description:
14.9 gblur_vulkan
Apply Gaussian blur filter on Vulkan frames.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: gblur_vulkan

options.description: Set horizontal sigma, standard deviation of Gaussian blur. Default is 0.5.
options.name: sigma

options.description: Set vertical sigma, if negative it will be same as sigma. Default is -1.
options.name: sigmaV

options.description: Set which planes to filter. By default all planes are filtered.
options.name: planes

options.description: Set the kernel size along the horizontal axis. Default is 19.
options.name: size

options.description: Set the kernel size along the vertical axis. Default is 0, which sets to use the same value as size.
options.name: sizeV
